code: import axios from'axios';var BASE_URL="https://61b2b99ac8d4640017aaf4af.mockapi.io";export var getListPostApi=function getListPostApi(){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/News"));};export var getPostIdApi=function getPostIdApi(postId){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/News/").concat(postId));};export var createPostApi=function createPostApi(post){return axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/News"),post);};
